Description:
Detects PowerShell module creation where the module Contents are set to "function Get-VMRemoteFXPhysicalVideoAdapter". This could be a sign of potential abuse of the "RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.exe" binary which is known to be vulnerable to module load-order hijacking.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems), frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential RemoteFXvGPUDisablement.EXE Abuse - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where payload like '%modulecontents=function get-vmremotefxphysicalvideoadapter {%'
